infoSections.text: **Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA)** is another dimensionality reduction technique similar to PCA. However, it attempts to maximize the separability of different classes of data instead of maximizing the variance of the samples.

tasks.taskDescription: Watch this short video to get a conceptual understanding of LDA. As a check for understanding, can you think of situations when LDA would be better than PCA? What about the reverse?

videos.title: StatQuest: Linear Discriminant Analysis (LDA) clearly explained
